p: EC is a monomeric flavanol present in noteworthy concentrations in cocoa powder, chocolate, and tea [ 61]; as presented in Table 3, except for cardamom and lecithin, all other assessed matrices exhibit EC in their composition. The highest EC values were detected in vanilla while the lowest value of EC was detected in stevia. Similar EC results were reported in literature studies for cocoa powder [ 62] and green tea [ 63].
